forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds light and variable.
